last_episode_to_air.name: Kansen 3: Shuto Houkai
last_episode_to_air.overview:
Still continuing in the Kansen series

Four years have passed since the outbreak of the "Unknown" virus attacking the Japanese city has now been reduced by quarantining those affected by infection with the addition of providing effective vaccines. However, the "Unknown Level 4" virus has not completely disappeared and is now beginning to explode and begin to spread to everyone.
